Question
========
  
Evaluate the following statements about grouped-frequency tables.

	I. The width of the intervals should be chosen such that approximately 10 intervals are created. II. Once scores are included in a grouped-frequency distribution, it is no longer possible to determine the exact value of the original scores.

  
Answerlist
----------
* Utterance I is correct, utterance II is incorrect.
* Utterance I is incorrect, utterance II is correct.
* Both statements are correct.
* Both statements are incorrect.
